text: Manipur University of Culture is a State Public University established and recognised by the State Government of Manipur. ==History== It was established through an Act of the Manipur State Legislature, The Manipur University of Culture Act, 2015. Its main purpose is to serve the people of Manipur in terms of cultural studies and also to promote the rich cultural heritage of the State. Currently it operates from its temporary campus in Palace Compound, Imphal. Classes for the first batch of students has started from Fall 2016.http://e-pao.net/GP.asp?src=3..210916.sep16https://www.ifp.co.in/page/items/33043/manipur- cultural-university-to-commence-by-august The University is recognized by the State Government of Manipur and UGC, Government of India. https://www.ugc.ac.in/stateuniversitylist.aspx?id=22&Unitype;=2 ==References== Category:Universities in Manipur Category:Education in Imphal Category:2015 establishments in India Category:Educational institutions established in 2015 Category:State universities in India
title: Manipur University of Culture
